meanings.sent1: The number of flowers in the garden octupled after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her savings octupled when she started investing in stocks.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to octuple the number of rabbits inside!
meanings.sent4: His excitement octupled when he saw the surprise birthday party waiting for him.
meanings.sent5: The population of the small town octupled overnight due to a music festival.

meanings.definition: Become eight times as much or as many
meanings.sent1: The amount of homework octupled over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The traffic on the highway octupled during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The cookies on the plate seemed to octuple when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him octupled with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The noise level in the classroom octupled as the children got more excited.
